content.text:
# List of Turkish European Film Award winners and nominees

This is a list of Turkish European Film Award winners and nominees. This list details the performances of Turkish actors, actresses, and films that have either been submitted or nominated for, or have won, a European Film Award.
Main categories
{| class="wikitable" width="100%" cellpadding="5"
|-
!width="5%"|Year
!width="18%"|Award
!width="28%"|Recipient
!width="10%"|Status
!width="38%"|Note
|-
| 1989 || Young European Film of the Year || Mist ||  || Turkish-Swiss co-production
|-
| 2003 || European Discovery of the Year || Fuse ||  || Bosnian-Austrian-Turkish co-production
|-
| 2004 || Best Film || Head-On ||  || German-Turkish co-production
|-
|rowspan="2"| 2007 || Best Film || The Edge of Heaven ||  || German-Turkish co-production
|-
| European Discovery of the Year || A Man’s Fear of God ||  || Turkish-German co-production
|-
| 2008 || European Discovery of the Year || Summer Book ||  ||
|-
| 2009 || European Discovery of the Year || Autumn ||  || Turkish-German co-production
|-
|rowspan="3"| 2010 || Best European Co-Producer || Zeynep Özbatur Atakan ||  ||
|-
| Best Film || Honey ||  ||
|-
|  Best Actress ||Sibel Kekilli for When We Leave ||  || German born to a family of Turkish origin (renounced Turkish citizenship in 1999)
|-
| 2014 || Best Film || Winter Sleep ||  ||
|-
|}
